com.poesys.db.dao

Class MemcachedService<T extends IDbDto>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.poesys.db.dao.MemcachedService<T>

  • public class MemcachedService<T extends IDbDto>
extends java.lang.Object
    A service class for memcached, providing all the services that Poesys/DB uses from the spymemcached client.
    Author:
    Robert J. Muller

    • Method Detail

      • getObject

        public T getObject(IPrimaryKey key,
          int expireTime)

      • getSockets

        private static java.util.List<java.net.InetSocketAddress> getSockets()
        Get the hostname/port combinations for the sockets to which the client will connect. The sockets are in a single property string in the format <hostname>:<port>,... where <hostname> is a valid authority (domain or IP address) and <port> is an integer between 0 and 65,535.
        Returns:
        a list of Internet Socket Address objects
